Dr. Sergey Sundukovskiy

Head of Commerce, Capital One

Dr. Sergey Sundukovskiy is a Head of Commerce for Capital One. Sergey has over 20 years of experience serving in capacities of Chief Technology Officer, Chief Information Officer and Chief Product Officer.
